strengths: Clear focus on core data engineering responsibilities
Modern tooling requirements (Airflow, Databricks, Great Expectations)
Established company with OCMP strategy suggesting stable platform
concerns: Onsite requirement in Seoul with 3-month probation period
No information about compensation, benefits, or growth opportunities
Limited information about team structure and engineering practices
best_fit_for: Mid-level data engineers with SQL, Python, and workflow manager experience
Candidates seeking to work in established Korean tech company with modern data stack
red_flags_to_probe: Ask about actual work hours and expectations for onsite work
Inquire about team structure and reporting relationships
Understand compensation package and benefits not mentioned in posting
negotiation_leverage: Experience with multiple workflow managers (Airflow, Dagster, Prefect) is valuable
Data quality tool experience (Great Expectations, Soda) is a differentiator
summary.overall_assessment: Solid opportunity for mid-level data engineers seeking to work with modern tools at an established Korean tech company. Role is well-defined with reasonable requirements, but lacks information about compensation, benefits, and growth opportunities. Main considerations are the onsite requirement in Seoul and limited transparency about company culture and practices.
